title: Kobo-chan
synopsis: Kobo Tabata lives in a typical Japanese family. His father is a normal salary-man, his mother's a typical housewife, his grandparents (from his mother's side) help to take care of the family and it's pets, and his uncle's a slightly obese high school teacher. Still, they manage to find odd situations that sometimes arise due to Kobo's growing up process or simply because of their own habits and misunderstandings. (Source: ANN)
opening_themes: "Nippon Cha! Cha! Cha! (ニッポン チャ！チャ！チャ！)" by Konpeitou (eps 1-10)
"Koi shite Zoo (恋してZOO)" by Hiroko Kurumizawa (eps 11-20)
"Hana no Run Run Power (花のランランパワー)" by The Mashin Brothers (eps 21-31)
"Kobo-chan Glue (コボちゃんグルー)" by Kenji Ootsuki, Emmanuel 5, and Ikue Ootani (eps 32-42)
"Ganbare Otoko no Ko (ガンバレ男の子)" by Ikue Otani (eps 43-63)
ending_themes: "Yume no Okazu (夢のおかず)" by Cherish (チェリッシュ) (eps 1-20)
"Shiroi Sneaker (白いスニーカー)" by Cherish (eps 21-42)
"Ashita mo Aeru (明日も会える)" by Nami Hirai (eps 43-63)
